name.gano.astro.propogators.solvers
Class RungeKutta78

java.lang.Object
  name.gano.astro.propogators.solvers.RungeKutta78

public class RungeKutta78
extends java.lang.Object

Implements a Runge-Kutta-Fehlberg adaptive step size integrator from Numerical Recipes. Modified to RK78 from the original RK45 in NR. RK78 values from Erwin Fehlberg, NASA TR R-287
